title: CONWAY THE MACHINE DROPS BY THE SHOW
description:
Jalen & Jacoby tackle the latest NBA news, including a potential MVP push by DeMar DeRozan, Phoenix showing out with CP3 on the shelf, Jayson Tatum and the Celtics keeping their momentum, and a preview of what to expect from James Harden's debut with the Philadelphia 76ers. All that and more, on J&J. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Is DeMar DeRozan A Legitimate MVP Candidate?
